I'm an author / maintainer of a handful of R packages

* **[slackr](https://matthewrkaye.com/slackr/)** is a wrapper of the Slack API in R.
* **[fitbitr](https://matthewrkaye.com/fitbitr/)** is a wrapper of the Fitbit API in R.
* **[lightMLFlow](https://github.com/collegevine/lightMLFlow)** is an opinionated R wrapper of the MLFlow REST API.
